entry.title: Transforming Contact Center Experiences: A Detailed Overview of Queue Selection using Generative AI

link.title: Transforming Contact Center Experiences: A Detailed Overview of Queue Selection using Generative AI

entry.summary: In this blog post we will be looking at using generative AI to perform queue selection in Amazon Connect

entry.title: Using Stored Prompts with Lambda and OpenAI ChatGPT

link.title: Using Stored Prompts with Lambda and OpenAI ChatGPT

entry.summary: In this blog post we are looking at how to used the concept of Stored Prompts with a generative AI service such as ChatGPT from AWS

entry.title: Amazon Connect: Embracing Modular Flows for Enhanced Efficiency and Scalability - Part 2

link.title: Amazon Connect: Embracing Modular Flows for Enhanced Efficiency and Scalability - Part 2

entry.summary: In this second part of the series of blog posts around a modular Amazon Connect solution, we will be looking at how a front end can be designed to allow the easy configuration of the contact center.

entry.title: Amazon Connect: Embracing Modular Flows for Enhanced Efficiency and Scalability - Part 1

link.title: Amazon Connect: Embracing Modular Flows for Enhanced Efficiency and Scalability - Part 1

entry.summary: In this first blog post in the series we will be looking at how using modular flows can improve the operations of a contact centers. Specifically looking at how Amazon Connect will execute these modules and their configuration.

entry.title: Amazon Connect: Customer control of queue music

link.title: Amazon Connect: Customer control of queue music

entry.summary: In this blog post we are going to show how a queue can be set up to allow the caller to control their queue music, allowing skipping and stopping of the music while they wait.
